item.title: A very jolly lynx
item.description: Oh man, even if I’m still trying to study drawing females, I’m really proud how this one turned out! Although I wish I was more consistent with how I draw her, I feel like it’s just luck this time around. Even now, Iâ€™m still struggling with the 3/4 view

item.title: Layla sketches
item.description: Trying to practice proportions and basics. Honestly don’t know what I was going for here. I still don’t know how to pose the limbs and arms.

item.title: Kaya mo yan!
item.description: i’m so sorry i had to do this just to motivate myself

item.title: Layla nanaman ulet
item.description: patulong nga also she got herself a brand new (as in hindi gamit) sando for her upcoming birthday this thursday! kung magpapagameshow ako, hindi jacket yung consolation kundi sando nagpapicture siya nang suot suot yung BAGONG sando niya. Yun nga lang, nalimutan niayng hindi kasya sa facebook dp yung buong katawan niya.

item.title: Ginhawa
item.description: Finally, after an entire month of non-stop long exams and projects, I could finally take a break from acads! Layla can go home and take a long rest at last. Commuting back home, Layla sure saw a lot of restaurants along Maginhawa street that she even thought of dining out along with her friends! â€¦ If only she had the money to do soâ€¦ I guess thatâ€™s life for Layla! Even the tricycle driver knew that she doesnâ€™t have the money for the fare and bailed out on her!

item.title: October sketches
item.description: i wish i had more time to practice drawing human anatomy, but since my schedule and every other brick wall hindering me aren’t giving me time, I unfortunately have to go with these. lord, sana biyayaan niyo po ako ng isang magandang asawa. Gets mo ba? inamogago pero parang may tama yung gumawa nito eh when u flip and land a hit on hunter whoâ€™s already low on hp peace out yo parang ganito yung naririnig ko parati sa bibig ng iba eh

item.title: First Furry OC?
item.description: I was actually trying to make her look like a lynx. Please be nice to her! Sheâ€™s really happy to get a fresh new sando (actually used, donâ€™t tell her) for her birthday! While the tenant is busy with his ranked match, Layla opts to sleep at the counter of the store. Huli ka balbon! magsiligo na kayo mga bata

item.title: Three Strikes
item.description: Stick with him and you’ll probably crash.
